title: Drawing, "Design for a Pen Holder", 1942
medium: Pen and black ink, yellow color pencil, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp: In black ink at upper right: 173.
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink at lower center: STYLOPHORE/CLOUTÉ VERMEIL/BOULE - 10 o - PLOMBÉE/LIBRE/; in graphite: PIQUIÉRE SELLIER;  in pen and black ink: 12 cms x 12 cms/HAUTEUR TOTALE 5 cms, 7; at lower right: JEAN PUIFORCAT/42.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Spherical holder indicated in yellow pencil to be executed in vermeil set within a square base drawn in plan and elevation whose sides are decorated with five studs indicated in yellow color pencil to be executed in vermeil. Underdrawing in graphite of geometric measurements.
